name: Fidget Pop It
description:
Relax and relieve stress by popping bubbles in Fidget Anti- Stress Releaser! One of the best newest anti-stress games ever. It’s super calming, and it’s also a very good game to play if your mad or stressed. No need to wait for a package to arrive with bubble wrap! You can pop the bubbles any time, release stress and relax! Jump in the action & have fun!!!

Features:

Full Source-code.

Compatible with all modern browsers.

Simple and clean design.

HTML5 Game Awesome gameplay.

One touch control.

1280×720 resolution.

Touch & mouse controls.

What’s Included:

HTML5 Source code project

Game art for easy reskin Documentation

Don’t forget to check out our other games, we upload new games weekly. Also be sure to follow us.
